decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly lowering your own life total to increase the power of Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler, while utilizing disruptive spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand. The deck packs removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember to deal with threats, as well as counterspells like Stubborn Denial for protection. With aggressive creatures and powerful spells, this deck aims to apply pressure early on and finish off opponents quickly before they can stabilize. The use of Mishra's Bauble and Thought Scour helps with card selection and filling the graveyard for delve spells.

This deck is focused on assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate a large amount of colorless mana quickly, allowing for powerful plays such as casting big threats like Wurmcoil Engine, Walking Ballista, Ulamog, and Ugin. The deck also includes cards like Relic of Progenitus and Oblivion Stone to control the opponent's graveyard and board state. The inclusion of Karn, the Great Creator and Karn Liberated provides additional versatility and control options to deal with a variety of threats.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using low cost, high impact burn spells and aggressive creatures. By playing efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear alongside powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Rift Bolt, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel and Searing Blaze helps to punish opponents for playing spells and creatures, allowing the deck to maintain momentum and finish off the opponent quickly.

This deck revolves around the aggressive use of artifact creatures and artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Galvanic Blast for direct damage, Cranial Plating to buff creatures, and Steel Overseer to pump up the team, the goal is to swarm the board with efficient threats. The deck also includes some card draw in Experimental Frenzy and utility in Welding Jar to protect key pieces. The synergy between these artifact cards and the aggressive creatures creates a fast-paced, proactive strategy that aims to outpace and outmuscle the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also maintaining board presence with creatures like Restoration Angel and Spell Queller. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Teferi, Time Raveler to generate card advantage and control the game. Lingering Souls provides a constant stream of tokens for defense or offense. The deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent through efficient removal and powerful threats.

The main concept of this UR Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy through counterspells and removal spells, while controlling the game with powerful card advantage engines like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Snapcaster Mage. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan with cards like Thing in the Ice and Blood Moon, while maintaining card selection and tempo advantage with cards like Serum Visions and Cryptic Command. By controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's spells, this deck aims to win through incremental advantage and superior decision-making.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx to cast big threats like Platinum Emperion and Craterhoof Behemoth. The deck also utilizes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Primal Command to control the opponent's board while generating value with cards like Eternal Witness. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and control effects, while utilizing the Gruul color combination to provide flexibility and options in gameplay.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana and drawing through the deck to assemble the combo pieces needed for a strong finish. By utilizing cards like Baral, Chief of Compliance and Goblin Electromancer to reduce spell costs, the deck aims to cast multiple spells in a single turn to generate storm count, ultimately leading to a lethal Grapeshot or a massive Empty the Warrens for a swarm of creatures. Gifts Ungiven is used to tutor for key cards, while cantrips like Serum Visions and Sleight of Hand help dig deeper into the deck for combo pieces.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using lands like Eldrazi Temple and Urza's lands to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher. The deck also utilizes Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opponent's artifacts and Chalice of the Void to disrupt their spells. The inclusion of All Is Dust and Blast Zone helps to control the board and deal with threats. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and efficient removal spells while utilizing powerful Eldrazi synergy.

This deck focuses on creating an infinite combo loop using Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian to generate endless copies of Felidar Guardian. By using this combo, the player can repeatedly blink their permanents and gain value each time they do so, ultimately overwhelming their opponent with powerful board presence and advantage. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategies. Additionally, it includes efficient mana acceleration and card selection tools to support the combo and ensure its success.

The deck focuses on assembling Jeskai Ascendancy along with creatures such as Birds of Paradise and Fatestitcher to create a combo engine that generates infinite mana and card draw. Glittering Wish is used to tutor for key pieces while cards like Cerulean Wisps and Manamorphose help to chain spells together and trigger the Jeskai Ascendancy ability multiple times in a turn. The deck aims to win by creating a large board state and overwhelming the opponent with powerful spells and creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to consistently fill the graveyard with cards like Bloodghast, Narcomoeba, Prized Amalgam, and Stinkweed Imp using cards like Cathartic Reunion, Faithless Looting, and Life from the Loam. By doing so, you can repeatedly return these creatures to the battlefield for free and overwhelm your opponent with a constant stream of threats. Creeping Chill and Conflagrate provide additional reach and removal options, while cards like Shriekhorn help accelerate the dredge process. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on countering and removing opponent threats while ramping up mana with cards like Growth Spiral and Wilderness Reclamation. It aims to control the game through card advantage with Snapcaster Mage and Mystical Teachings, while also having the ability to generate large amounts of mana to cast powerful spells like Blue Sun's Zenith and Nexus of Fate. The deck also includes versatile removal options like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay, with a toolbox of lands like Field of Ruin and Blast Zone to handle various threats.

The main theme of this UW Control deck is to maintain control over the game through card advantage and disruption. The deck includes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, along with versatile spells like Cryptic Command and Path to Exile. The deck focuses on controlling the board, countering opponent's spells, and drawing extra cards to outvalue the opponent. With a mix of removal, counter magic, card draw, and win conditions, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through attrition and resource management.

This deck focuses on quickly getting powerful creatures onto the battlefield through reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Through the Breach. Emrakul, Griselbrand, and Ilharg are the key threats that can end the game in a single turn if they are able to attack. Generator Servant and Simian Spirit Guide help to accelerate the deck's mana production, while Faithless Looting and Cathartic Reunion provide card selection and fuel for graveyard strategies. The deck aims to win the game through explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with massive creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By maximizing damage output and maintaining a consistent stream of threats, this deck aims to finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize or regain control of the game. The mana base is optimized to ensure a smooth and consistent curve, enabling the deck to consistently apply pressure and close out games in a swift manner.
